directions: Place ground beef in a large, deep skillet. Cook over medium high heat until evenly brown. Drain and crumble.
In a medium bowl, mix together the beef, processed cheese sauce, salt and pepper. Spread the mixture  on the slices of cocktail rye.
Place the slices on a large baking sheet, and broil 5 minutes, or until the cheese sauce is melted.
title: Cheese Wizards
